title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1671/93 of 29 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 420/93 making imports of certain fishery products subject to observance of the reference price
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1671/93 of 29 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 420/93 making imports of certain fishery products subject to observance of the reference price
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Regulation (EEC) No 420/93 is hereby amended as follows: in Article 2, '30 June 1993' is replaced by '30 September 1993'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1993.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 76, 30. 3. 1993, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 48, 26. 2. 1993, p. 12.
(4) OJ No L 61, 13. 3. 1993, p. 51.
